column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////My friends and I ordered the chicken wings
column7: and chicken ramen. They allow you to choose how spicy you want it. There is also a spicy sauce that lets you do it yourself. I think the gyoza is home-made
column8: but it tastes like any typical gyoza. The best ramen broth out of the four is white tonkotsu. Btw
column9: you can also choose whether you want thin or thick ramen noodles which does make a huge difference. The pork is soooo good!!!! Pork belly is my favorite and the flavor is just right.
